      • Monster

        protected Monster(int str,
                  int dex,
                  int intel)
        this is the base constructor for all monsters.
        Parameters:
        str - the strength stat for the monster being created.
        dex - the dexterity stat for the monster being created.
        intel - the intelligence stat for the monster being created.

      • calculateBase

        private int calculateBase(int attr,
                          int multi)
        calculates a base value using an attribute and multiply it by the given value.
        Parameters:
        attr - attribute value passed in.
        multi - multiplier value passed in.
        Returns:
        returns the base value calculated.

      • calculateBonus

        private int calculateBonus(int attr,
                           int basePoint,
                           int negativeBase,
                           int frequency,
                           int gains)
        calculates a bonus value based on an attribute and certain restraints on that value.
        Parameters:
        attr - attribute value passed in.
        basePoint - base value passed in to determine positive gain.
        negativeBase - base value passed in to determine the negative effects.
        frequency - value passed in to determine the frequency of the gains.
        gains - value passed in to determine the gains for the bonuses.
        Returns:
        returns the calculated bonus.
